name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As an advanced Software Engineer with 8 years of experience, I possess strong skills in **.NET**, **C#**, **Azure**, and **SQL**, coupled with practical experience in **Microsoft SQL Server** and modern **JavaScript** frameworks. I am adept at implementing **ASP.NET** applications, utilizing **AJAX** for enhanced user experiences, and leveraging CI/CD practices using **Git**, **GitHub**, and **Jenkins** to streamline development processes. My problem-solving skills are complemented by a commitment to quality assurance (QA) and troubleshooting to deliver high-performance solutions in the healthcare and financial sectors.

I have led the development of enterprise-grade platforms with a full-stack approach, utilizing **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. My cloud expertise spans across **Azure** services, reinforcing the delivery of secure and compliant applications aligned with industry standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. My background includes developing and deploying machine learning pipelines and MLOps workflows with tools such as **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**, enabling predictive analytics and intelligent automation functionalities.
